parts.title: Part 1 - Course Introduction
parts.description: Welcome to your first lesson in web development. In this video, you'll meet your professor and learn what to expect in this course.
keyConcepts: What to expect in this course

question2.text: Which of the following is true about learning how to code?

options.text: You can learn how to code only by watching videos.
You have to write perfect code every time.
Learning how to code takes lots of practice and you will make many mistakes along the way.

parts.title: Part 2 - Tool Setup (PyCharm)
parts.description: Learn about PyCharm, the tool used to work with Python. Download installation guide
keyConcepts: Installing and getting familiar with Pycharm

options.text: Displaying text on the screen to the user
Doesn't run (that is, it gives an error)

parts.title: Part 3 - User Output and comments
parts.description: In this video, you will learn how to print text and add comments in Python.
keyConcepts: Commenting code for your eyes only

question1.text: What is NOT true about Comments in Python?

options.text: Comments start with the # symbol in Python
Python runs comments as part of the program

question2.text: What is an Escape character in Python?

options.text: A special symbol used to represent characters that can't be typed directly
A key used to stop the program

question3.text: What does \n do in a Python string?

options.text: Moves the text to a new line
Prints a slash and letter n
